T=int(raw_input());
for t in range(T) :
	N=int(raw_input());
	D=[int(i) for i in raw_input().split()];
	D.sort();
	survive=0;
	killed=0;
	for i in D :
		survive=survive+1;
		if survive > i :
			break;
		else :
			killed=killed+1;
		if killed % 6 ==0 :
			survive=survive+1;
	if killed == N :
		print "Bhai Ho!";
	else :
		print "Killed "+str(killed);
